item.title: Habits
item.description: Habits Aktualnie Rano (6:20): Walking the dog (10 min) Wim Hoff’s WHM breathing exercises or Meditation - relaxation, counting breaths, mindfulness (15 min) Celery juice or water with lemon (10 min) Brushing teeth (left hand) (5 min) Tabata (5 min) Cold shower (5 min) Walking with autiobook/podcast (20 min) Breakfast (20 min) RozpoczÄ™cie pracy 8:00 Task planning (10 min) Journaling - [[LIFE/KNOWLEDGE/INFO/5 Minute Journal]] (10 min) Own work (1 hour) To consider/implement 6 interesting habits:
